DOC.brief_summary: This is a sixteen-week double-blind active-controlled follow-on and 28-week single-blind extension study for patients who participated in study NK-104-305.
DOC.brief_title: Follow-On Study of Pitavastatin Versus Atorvastatin in Patients With Type II Diabetes Mellitus and Combined Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Type II diabetes mellitus Combined dyslipidemia Completed NK104305 (NCT00309751) Withdrawal from NK104305 (NCT00309751)
